/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their bare branches reaching out into the clear blue sky. The buildings on the right side of the street are tall and modern, their glass facades reflecting the sunlight. On the left side, there's a red building with a white roof, adding a splash of color to the scene. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. The overall atmosphere is peaceful and serene, a typical day in a bustling city.
